<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King. His Majesties offer of pardon to the rebells now in arms against Him. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill, Imprinted at London : MDCXLII. [1642]
"Given at Our court at Edge-Hill, this 24. day of October, in the eighteenth yeer of Our reign.". With engraving of royal seal at head of document. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill, Imprinted at London : MDCXLII. [1642]
"Given at Our court at Edge-Hill, this 24. day of October, in the eighteenth yeer of Our reign.". With engraving of royal seal at head of document. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
the Kings most excellent Majestie: and
